Package weather.data

Class LocationReaderWriter

java.lang.Object
weather.data.LocationReaderWriter
public class LocationReaderWriter extends Object
Handles reading and writing the user's location preference to and from a file. The file is stored externally, in the user's home directory, to ensure the application can operate dynamically with a JAR file.

  • Method Details

    • loadLocationPreference

      public String loadLocationPreference()
      Loads the user's location preference from a file.
      Returns:
      The location preference if the file exists and has content; null otherwise.

    • writeLocationPreference

      public void writeLocationPreference(String location)
      Writes the user's location preference to a file.
      Parameters:
      location - The user's location preference to write to the file.

    • getUserLocation

      public String getUserLocation()
      Prompts the user to enter their location and validates the input format.
      Returns:
      A string representing the user's location in an accepted format.
